event.description: {CovLStrv2{The `httponly` attribute is not enabled for cookies. Enabling the `httponly` attribute prevents an attacker from stealing or modifying cookie data via cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks executed against vulnerable client-side applications.}}
{CovLStrv2{Explicitly set the argument `httponly` to `true` as the default value is `false`.}}
